tenant_id.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

actions.name: List networks
actions.description:

 information in the network list includes extended network
 attributes.

tenant_id.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

id.description:
The unique identifier associated
 with the network.

actions.name: Show network information
actions.description:
Shows information including extended attributes for a
 specified network.
